| HistoryText             = When [[Thommanom (Earth-616)|Angkor]] nearly beat [[Simon Williams (Earth-616)|Wonder Man]] to death, the Crazy Eight (who were various acquaintances of Simon) all gained powers trying to help their friend while his powers spiraled wildly out of control.{{Citation}}

Once Simon's powers continued to fail him, the eight people briefly decided to try to stand in for him as a super team, the Crazy Eight.{{R|Wonder Man Vol 2 19}}

Wonder Man later reabsorbed the ionic powers the team had gained, with the exception of Dreamer and Stat, who secretly kept a small amount of their abilities.{{Citation}}

When word got around that Wonder Man had been murdered, the eight disbanded. Alex got married, Argus filmed a documentary, Aundray opened a dance studio, Ginger and LaHoya starred in a TV show filmed in New Zeland, and Gloria took over as Spider's guardian.{{r|All-New Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 3}}
